name: Khaled Jamal Malowalain, MBA
about: An Operations Associate at a leading cryptocurrency mining company, looking forward to connecting with like minded people and building long lasting relationships.

experience.title: Operations Associate
experience.description: - Collaborate with our team of mining specialists to formulate and execute strategic purchasing plans, ensuring that we procure the necessary equipment at the most competitive prices.- Contribute to the optimization of our Bitcoin, Kadena, Ethereum, and Litecoin mining and hosting services, emphasizing efficiency and long-term profitability. - Dedicated to overseeing all facets of operations, encompassing distribution, exceptional customer service, HR management, efficient administration, and dynamic sales strategies.- Strategically network to enhance the branch and company's reputation, communicating clear expectations to vendors and contractors, ensuring timely deliverables, adherence to budgetary targets, and site-specific requirements.- Deliver top-tier client support across multiple platforms, including ZenDesk, Telegram, Discord, Email, and others, providing an exceptional client experience.
